title: Directive 3.1
description: They came from the sky like the Deathgods of the old Ielenl stories. They wanted to enforce their extinct masters will, follow the final order they were given. That was their plan; a strong-willed man’s dream that had stubbornly driven Earth forward for more than two hundred years. There was no other road but the one he’d shown them.This is the sequel to A.S.H.O.S. Eleven and the second volume in the Final Colony series.
author: Angelo Tsanatelis
